TokenDarkness.debug_hint: Output debugging to the console.  Requires restart.
TokenDarkness.chatoutput_hint: Output to the chat whenever a token changes between darkness, dim light, and bright light after moving. Only occurs when Debug is enabled
TokenDarkness.globalcheck_enabled_hint: If Enabled the scene will be checked for Global Illumination & Darkness Level. When checking the darkness level, the order of checks to determine darkness level is 'Scene: Global Illumination Threshold', 'Dark Threshold', 'Dim Threshold'
TokenDarkness.globaldimthreshold_hint: The Scene 'Darkness Level' that is considered to be Dim Light
TokenDarkness.globaldarkthreshold_hint: The Scene 'Darkness Level' that is considered to be Darkness.  Will override the Dim Threshold if set to a lower number.
